meanings.definition: Programs and other operating information used by a computer.
meanings.sent1: I installed new software on my computer to help me edit photos.
meanings.sent2: The software on my laptop helps me write documents and browse the internet.
meanings.sent3: The software on my computer decided to take a break right before my important presentation!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex software, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The software running on my computer is like a helpful assistant, always ready to assist me.

meanings.definition: The programs, routines, and symbolic languages that control the functioning of a computer.
meanings.sent1: Learning to code software can be challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: The software in the background keeps my computer running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous software played a prank by changing all the icons on my desktop.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a powerful software, influencing the thoughts of those around him.
meanings.sent5: The software controlling the traffic lights ensured a smooth flow of cars through the intersection.
